titleStmt.title: A Clear proof of the certainty and usefulness of the Protestant rule of faith Scripture, after the help of ministerial guides, finally interpreted by each men's private sense / published with allowance.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills ... and are to be sold at his printing house ...,

notesStmt.note: "This proof is drawn from the Answer to the Address presented to the ministers of the Church of England": p.3.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
